column1: For  the  foregoing  reasons,  I  hold  that  there  is  no  basis  to  interfere  with  the
findings of the learned Magistrate of Ratnapura and the learned Provincial High
Court Judge of Ratnapura. Thus, the Appeal is dismissed with costs fixed at Rs.
10,000/-.  The  Registrar  is  directed  to  dispatch  the  original  case  record  along
with a copy of this Judgment to the Magistrateâ€™s Court of Ratnapura forthwith.
